ClearArmor is an American cyber security firm based in Riegelsville, Pennsylvania. ClearArmor is the first cybersecurity company focused on "CyberSecurity Resource Planning (CSRP)". ClearArmor was named one of the "20 Most Promising Cyber Security Solution Providers" by CIOReview.
Services.
CyberSecurity is achieved by implementing a program, framework, and technology designed to fit the needs of the organization. A NIST CSF CyberSecurity Framework-based design enables organizations to benefit from a wide range of industry best practices and meets regulatory requirements.
ClearArmor’s CSRP (CyberSecurity Resource Planning) is a leadership driven, structured business process that implements the NIST CSF with processes, technology, metrics thereby achieving cyber security CSRP provides for a top-down methodology as dictated by the NIST Framework.
ClearArmor provides a one-stop Technology and Process solution for NIST-Compliant CyberSecurity which strengthens cybersecurity as dictated by the Presidential Executive Order on Strengthening the Cybersecurity of Federal Networks and Critical Infrastructure in May 2017.
